author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Related https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4056

Based on discussion with @PowerShell/powershell-committee we agreed to publish a [module](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/WindowsPSModulePath/1.0.0) with the capability to add the Windows PowerShell PSModulePath to make it easier for novice users and remove the previously added profile that appended that path and got us sufficient data on compatibility.
title: removed default profile that appended WindowsPowerShell PSModulePath
